ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq1i | |- ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> ( B i^i A ) = 0H ) |

| 7 | 1 | #P_sheli | |- ( C e. A -> C e. ~H ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ax-hvcom | |- ( ( D e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( D +h C ) = ( C +h D ) ) |

| 14 | 1 | #P_sheli | |- ( z e. A -> z e. ~H ) |

| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( w e. B /\ z e. A ) -> ( w +h z ) = ( z +h w ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( w e. B /\ z e. A ) -> ( x = ( w +h z ) <-> x = ( z +h w ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_rexbidva | |- ( w e. B -> ( E. z e. A x = ( w +h z ) <-> E. z e. A x = ( z +h w ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_riotabiia | |- ( iota_ w e. B E. z e. A x = ( w +h z ) ) = ( iota_ w e. B E. z e. A x = ( z +h w ) ) |
| 20 | 12, 19 | #P_mpteq12i | |- ( x e. ( B +H A ) |-> ( iota_ w e. B E. z e. A x = ( w +h z ) ) ) = ( x e. ( A +H B ) |-> ( iota_ w e. B E. z e. A x = ( z +h w ) ) ) |

| 22 | 2, 1, 21 | #P_cdj3lem2 | |- ( ( D e. B /\ C e. A /\ ( B i^i A ) = 0H ) -> ( T ` ( D +h C ) ) = D ) |
| 23 | 11, 22 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( D e. B /\ C e. A /\ ( B i^i A ) = 0H ) -> ( T ` ( C +h D ) ) = D ) |

| 25 | 24 | #P_3com12 | |- ( ( C e. A /\ D e. B /\ ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) -> ( T ` ( C +h D ) ) = D ) |
